overview: Stef can be summed up as creative, funky, design-geek and an incredible connector. Stef is a people person through and through, always at the centre of the party with an eye on making sure everyone is at ease and has company to talk to. Being involved in design, Stef is a bit of a trend setter and likes to change his look as often as he updates his surroundings. Definitely someone to connect with.
